author: Kate Knibbs
title: 'Desus & Mero' Adapt to Life in Quarantine
description: The show is built around the joy of hanging out with its hosts—even more so than on other late-night TV programs. Here’s how it's surviving a moment when hanging out is impossible.
content: Having ones own TV show comes with a lot of perks, but these days regular grooming is the one The Kid Mero often misses most. Along with his comedy partner Desus Nice, Mero hosts Showtimes Desus & Mero, a show for which he normally gets his hair and makeu… [+5023 chars]
